children.text: To help avoi complications at admission, please observe the following instructions for use:
The ticket is only valid as a complete A4 printout.

Please ensure that the ticket is folded according to the folding instructions
opposite.

The ticket must be printed clearly in order to be read by the scanner at the
entrance.
Please protect the ticket from moisture and dirt.
The ticket is valid for one admission only and will be validated upon admission.

children.html:
FOLD THE TICKET ALONG THE MIDDLE
on the dotted line (fold mark 1), so that the printed side is on the outside.

FOLD THE TICKET AGAIN
along the second dotted line (fold mark 2) so that the
folding instructions are hidden on the inside.

DONE!
Now you will have the original ticket on one side, booking details
and the barcode on the other side. You are ready for check-in.

reportTypes.name: Ticket
reportTypes.description: A type of any sort of ticket
